trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that compares the value of an activity member to a specified value by using a specified comparison operator.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] You can use an ActivityTrackingCondition to constrain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> or an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"></xref> class.
If you use the default constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
You must also set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition"></xref> class by specifying an activity member and a value for comparison.
<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> is set to `member`, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is set to `value`.
The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
The dot delineated name of an activity member.
The value to be compared
member is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the name of the activity member that is to be compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value*>.

You can specify an activity property or field, a member of an activity property or field, or a single element of an activity property or field (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
For example, you can specify a single element of a collection.
If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set Member.

The value of the specified activity member is compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
The dot delineated name of the activity member
The condition was evaluated and Member is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
The condition was evaluated and Member is incorrectly formed.
The condition was evaluated and Member does not refer to a valid activity member.
Gets or sets the operator that is used in the comparison.
Currently only supports `Equals` and `NotEquals`.
One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator"></xref> values.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Equals" name="Equals" href=""></xref>.
The value that is to be compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member*>.

Value is compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set Value.
The value used in the comparison.
